thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Canada Factory Sales Declined in December

author: Kim Mackrael
title: Canada Factory Sales Declined in December
text:
OTTAWAâ€”Canadian manufacturing sales slid in December after reaching a record level in the previous month, falling short of expectations as petroleum and coal product sales fell.
Factory sales declined 0.3% in December from the previous month to a seasonally adjusted 55.52 billion Canadian dollars ($44.39 billion), Statistics Canada said Friday. The expectation among traders was for an increase in manufacturing sales of 0.3%, according to economists from Royal Bank of Canada.
